texts.desc: Currently finishing up my Master's in Interaction Design at SUPSI while interning as a frontend developer at Bureau Moeilijke Dingen in Eindhoven. Over my ten years in the design field, I spent most of my time at a boutique agency where I often found myself juggling various roles simultaneously. This environment provided me with the freedom to explore different disciplines and crafts, leading me to realize that versatility is what I find truly fulfilling and ultimately rewarding. I'm particularly drawn to projects that challenge me to think both creatively and systematically.

Above all, I consider myself a maker and problem solver. While tasks and tools may vary, they all serve the same purpose: telling engaging stories and creating useful and simply great experiences that users can relate to and be excited about. I firmly believe that understanding the problem deeply and approaching it holistically - whether through design thinking or computational logic - is key to creating exceptional products and experiences, regardless of the medium.
